name: Intelligence: Dogs
description:
Intelligence: Dogs - is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with dogs) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to collect the correct order of the image pieces. The essence of the game as in the old game "Tag" (15). The game will have 6 levels with a field size of 3x3, as well as 6 other levels with a field size of 4x4. Each level has a different image.
The game contains images of twelve dogs.

Key features:
- 12 different levels
- Random generation of tiles at the start of the level
- Develops the brain
- Achievements!
